issue.title: [Java] Support dictionary encoding for Union type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5997](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5997). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now only Union type is not supported in dictionary encoding.

In the last several weeks, we did some refactor for encoding and now it's time to support Union type.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5997?focusedCommentId=16891576) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4917
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4917>
